report.name: prohist_selectif

dataSource.name: Q_ANNEE_TRAITEE
dataSource.select: -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement au format 'MMAAAA' -- (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) SELECT DECODE( SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), NULL, TO_CHAR(datdebex, 'YYYY'), SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4) ) dc_annee_traitee FROM datdebex

dataSource.name: Q_PROHIST
dataSource.select: -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Query Etat $PROHIST -- Historique des Consommés par Projet -- DESFORMAT = g:\Commun\Lot_Commun\Reports\bip180.prt -- PARAMETRES DU REPORT : -- P_PARAM6 : Mois de traitement 'MM/AAAA' (Si année est vide, prendre Année dans datdebex!!!) -- P_PARAM7 : Code DPG (CHAR(6) ) (proplus.FACTPDSG) -- P_PARAM8 : Code ligne bip CHAR(3) (proplus.FACTPID) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- SELECT ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----- Eléments relatifs au projet principal courant : FACTPID courant ------------- -- dc_factpdsg : Code DPG projet principal -- dc_factpid : Code projet à traiter -- dc_factpcp : Ident Chef de Projet (CP) -- dc_factpno : Libellé du projet à traiter -- dc_nomcp : Nom du CP -- dc_pnomcp : Prénom du CP -- dc_sigdep : Libellé département -- dc_sigpole : Libellé Pôle -- dc_codgro : Code groupe ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pro.factpdsg dc_factpdsg, pro.factpid dc_factpid, MAX(pro.factpcp) dc_factpcp, MAX(pro.factpno) dc_factpno, MAX(res.rnom) dc_nomcp, MAX(res.rprenom) dc_pnomcp, MAX(str.sigdep) dc_sigdep, MAX(str.sigpole) dc_sigpole, MAX(str.codgro) dc_codgro, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----- Eléments relatifs aux projets associés au projet principal : différents PID ----- -- dc_pdsg : Code DPG projet associé -- dc_pid : Code projet associé -- dc_pnom : Libellé projet associé -- dc_codqualif : Code interne associé à la qualif de la ressource (Sert à faire tri) -- dc_tires : Ident ressource -- dc_nomres : Nom de la ressource -- dc_flag_type_ress: Flag indiquant état des ressources du projet associé : -- Si '1' ==> Ressources du projet -- Sinon ==> Ressources sous traitance i.e '2' --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pro.pdsg dc_pdsg, pro.pid dc_pid, MAX(pro.pnom) dc_pnom, DECODE(pro.qualif, 'GRA', '2', 'IFO','2','MO','2','INT','2','STA','2','MO','2', '1') dc_codqualif, MAX(pro.qualif) dc_qualif, DECODE(his.flag, '1', '1', '2') dc_flag_type_ress, pro.tires dc_tires, MAX(pro.rnom) dc_nomres, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Consommations de la ressource par mois -- On ne prend en compte que les mois <= au mois saisi !!! --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- DECODE( LEAST( '01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '01', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('01', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_01, DECODE( LEAST( '02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '02', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('02', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_02, DECODE( LEAST( '03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '03', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('03', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_03, DECODE( LEAST( '04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '04', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('04', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_04, DECODE( LEAST( '05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '05', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('05', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_05, DECODE( LEAST( '06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '06', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('06', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_06, DECODE( LEAST( '07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '07', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('07', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_07, DECODE( LEAST( '08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '08', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('08', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_08, DECODE( LEAST( '09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '09', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('09', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_09, DECODE( LEAST( '10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '10', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('10', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_10, DECODE( LEAST( '11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '11', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('11', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_11, DECODE( LEAST( '12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 1, 2) ), '12', pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress('12', SUBSTR(:P_PARAM6, 4, 4), pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, pro.pdsg, pro.pid, pro.tires, MAX(pro.qualif)), 0 ) dc_conso_12 FROM proplus pro, hispro his, ressource res, struct_info str, datdebex bex WHERE --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restriction aux ressources dont le code est différent de 0 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pro.tires != 0 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Jointure avec struct_info pour avoir les libellés DPG Projet Principal --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- AND pro.factpdsg = str.codsg (+) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Jointure avec Hispro pour avoir Etat des ressources (Ressources du Projet / Ressource sous traitance) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- AND pro.pid = his.factpid (+) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -- Jointure avec Ressource pour avoir Nom/Prénom Chef de Projet --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- AND pro.factpcp = res.ident (+) -------------------------------------------------------------- -- Restriction suivant Parametres du report -------------------------------------------------------------- &P_WHERE GROUP BY pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, DECODE(his.flag, '1', '1', '2'), pro.pdsg, pro.pid, DECODE(pro.qualif, 'GRA', '2', 'IFO','2','MO','2','INT','2','STA','2','MO','2', '1'), pro.tires ORDER BY ----------------------------------------------------------------- -- Clause ORDER BY ajoutée car Report ne semble pas bien faire le tri!!! ----------------------------------------------------------------- pro.factpdsg, pro.factpid, DECODE(his.flag, '1', '1', '2'), pro.pdsg, pro.pid, DECODE(pro.qualif, 'GRA', '2', 'IFO','2','MO','2','INT','2','STA','2','MO','2', '1'), pro.tires, MAX(pro.rnom)

formula.name: CF_SUM_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ
formula.defaultLabel: Cf Sum Tot Type Sous Proj

dataDescriptor.expression: DECODE ( LEAST ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '01' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '01' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '02' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '02' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '03' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '03' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '04' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '04' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '05' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '05' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '06' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '06' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '07' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '07' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '08' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '08' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '09' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '09' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '10' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '10' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '11' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '11' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

DECODE ( LEAST ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 1 , 2 ) ) , '12' , pack_verif_prohist.f_conso_ress ( '12' , SUBSTR ( : P_PARAM6 , 4 , 4 ) , pro.factpdsg , pro.factpid , pro.pdsg , pro.pid , pro.tires , MAX ( pro.qualif ) ) , 0 )

function.name: afterpform
cf_tot_ligne_ressformula
function.textSource: function CF_TOT_LIGNE_RESSFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :dc_conso_01 + :dc_conso_02 + :dc_conso_03 + :dc_conso_04 + :dc_conso_05 + :dc_conso_06 + :dc_conso_07 + :dc_conso_08 + :dc_conso_09 + :dc_conso_10 + :dc_conso_11 + :dc_conso_12 ; return(l_res); end;

function.name: cf_sum_tot_type_ressformula
function.textSource: function CF_SUM_TOT_TYPE_RESSFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_01 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_02 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_03 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_04 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_05 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_06 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_07 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_08 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_09 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_10 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_11 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_RESS_12; return(l_res); end;

function.name: cf_sum_tot_sous_projformula
function.textSource: function CF_SUM_TOT_SOUS_PROJFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_01 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_02 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_03 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_04 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_05 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_06 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_07 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_08 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_09 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_10 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_11 + :CS_TOT_SOUS_PROJ_12; return(l_res); end;

function.name: cf_sum_tot_type_sous_projformu
function.textSource:
function CF_SUM_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJFormu return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_01 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_02 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_03 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_04 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_05 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_06 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_07 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_08 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_09 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_10 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_11 + :CS_TOT_TYPE_SOUS_PROJ_12;
return(l_res); end;

function.name: cf_sum_tot_proj_ppalformula
function.textSource:
function CF_SUM_TOT_PROJ_PPALFormula return Number is l_res NUMBER(15, 2) := 0; begin l_res := :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_01 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_02 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_03 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_04 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_05 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_06 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_07 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_08 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_09 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_10 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_11 + :CS_TOT_PROJ_PPAL_12;
return(l_res); end;

<html>

<rw:style id="yourStyle"> <!-- Report Wizard inserts style link clause here --> </rw:style>
</head>
